00142 ## Generate a dictionary with all user paths with \em user_home, \em app_xml_file, \em category_xml_file, \em includes_xml_file, \em image_dir, \em software_dir, \em manuals_dir, \em html_dir and \em icon_dir.
00143 #
00144 # @param username - The User nick.
00145 # @return A dictionary with all user paths information.
00146 def get_all_user_path(username):
00147         return {'user_home':USERS_DIR + "/" + username,
00148                 'apps_xml_file':USERS_DIR + "/" + username + USER_APPS_XML_FILE,
00149                 'categories_xml_file':USERS_DIR + "/" + username + USER_CATEGORIES_XML_FILE,
00150                 'includes_xml_file':USERS_DIR + "/" + username + USER_INCLUDES_XML_FILE,
00151                 'image_dir':USERS_DIR + "/" + username + "/image",
00152                 'software_dir':USERS_DIR + "/" + username + "/image/software",
00153                 'manuals_dir':USERS_DIR + "/" + username + "/image/manuals",
00154                 'html_dir':USERS_DIR + "/" + username + "/image/html",
00155                 'icons_dir':USERS_DIR + "/" + username + "/image/html/icons"}

00157 ## Remove all in any user directory.
00158 #
00159 # @param username - The User nick.
00160 def mrproper_image(username):
00161         dir = get_all_user_path(username)
00162         if os.path.exists(dir['image_dir']):
00163                 os.system( "rm -rf '"+ dir['image_dir'] + "'")  
00164         os.mkdir(dir['image_dir'])
00165         os.mkdir(dir['software_dir'])
00166         os.mkdir(dir['manuals_dir'])
00167         os.mkdir(dir['html_dir'])
00168         os.mkdir(dir['icons_dir'])
00169 
00170 ## Make the user home.
00171 #
00172 # @param username - The User nick.
00173 def make_user_home(username):
00174         dir=get_all_user_path(username)
00175         if not os.path.exists(dir['user_home']):
00176                 os.mkdir(dir['user_home'])
00177         if not os.path.exists(dir['image_dir']):
00178                 os.mkdir(dir['image_dir'])
00179         if not os.path.exists(dir['software_dir']):
00180                 os.mkdir(dir['software_dir'])
00181         if not os.path.exists(dir['manuals_dir']):
00182                 os.mkdir(dir['manuals_dir'])
00183         if not os.path.exists(dir['html_dir']):
00184                 os.mkdir(dir['html_dir'])
00185         if not os.path.exists(dir['icons_dir']):
00186                 os.mkdir(dir['icons_dir'])
00187         if not os.path.exists(dir['categories_xml_file']):
00188                 shutil.copy(MASTER_DIR+"/baseconfig/categories.xml",dir['categories_xml_file'])
00189         if not os.path.exists(dir['apps_xml_file']):
00190                 shutil.copy(MASTER_DIR+"/baseconfig/apps.xml",dir['apps_xml_file'])
00191         if not os.path.exists(dir['includes_xml_file']):
00192                 shutil.copy(MASTER_DIR+"/baseconfig/includes.xml",dir['includes_xml_file'])

00194 ## Send a specific mail.
00195 #
00196 # @param subject - \em Subject email addres.
00197 # @param user_info - The user information dictionary: name, surname and mail.
00198 # @param text_file - The text file name template.
00199 # @param html_file - The html file name template.
00200 #
00201 # @see create_html_mail()
00202 def send_mail(subject, user_info, text_file, html_file):
00203         import smtplib
00204         from Cheetah.Template import Template
00205 
00206         # Generate the plain text and html text.
00207         mail_dic = {'user':user_info}
00208         fromaddr = MAIL_FROM_ADDRS
00209         toaddrs = user_info['name']+" "+user_info['surname']+" <"+user_info['mail']+">"
00210         text = Template( file=MAIL_TEMPLATES_DIR+"/"+MAIL_TEMPLATE+"/"+text_file, searchList=[mail_dic])        
00211         html = Template( file=MAIL_TEMPLATES_DIR+"/"+MAIL_TEMPLATE+"/"+html_file, searchList=[mail_dic])
00212         
00213         # Conect to the smtp server and send the e-mail.
00214         server = smtplib.SMTP(SMTP_SERVER, SMTP_PORT)
00215         if USE_LOGIN:
00216                 server.login(SMTP_USER, SMTP_PASSWORD)
00217         
00218         server.sendmail(fromaddr, toaddrs, create_html_mail(fromaddr, toaddrs, subject, "" + str(text), "" + str(html)))
00219         server.quit()
00220 
00221 ## Create a mime-message that will render HTML in popular MUAs, text in better ones.
00222 #
00223 # @param from_addr - \em From email addres.
00224 # @param to_addrs - \em To email addres.
00225 # @param subject - \em Subject email addres.
00226 # @param text - The email information in text format. 
00227 # @param html - The email indormation in html format.
00228 # @return the email.
00229 def create_html_mail(from_addr="", to_addrs= "", subject="", text="", html="" ):
00230         import MimeWriter
00231         import mimetools
00232         import cStringIO
00233         
00234         out = cStringIO.StringIO()  
00235         writer = MimeWriter.MimeWriter(out)
00236         
00237         # set up some basic headers, we put subject here
00238         writer.addheader("From", from_addr)
00239         writer.addheader("To", to_addrs)
00240         writer.addheader("Subject", subject)
00241         writer.addheader("MIME-Version", "1.0")
00242         writer.startmultipartbody("alternative")
00243         writer.flushheaders()
00244         
00245         # The plain text section
00246         if text != "":
00247                 txtin = cStringIO.StringIO(text)
00248                 subpart = writer.nextpart()
00249                 subpart.addheader("Content-Transfer-Encoding", "quoted-printable")
00250                 pout = subpart.startbody("text/plain", [("charset", 'us-ascii')])
00251                 mimetools.encode(txtin, pout, 'quoted-printable')
00252                 txtin.close()
00253 
00254         # The html section
00255         if html != "":
00256                 htmlin = cStringIO.StringIO(html)
00257                 # Start the html subpart of the message
00258                 subpart = writer.nextpart()
00259                 subpart.addheader("Content-Transfer-Encoding", "quoted-printable")
00260                 # Returns us a file-ish object we can write to
00261                 pout = subpart.startbody("text/html", [("charset", 'us-ascii')])
00262                 mimetools.encode(htmlin, pout, 'quoted-printable')
00263                 htmlin.close()
00264 
00265         # Clpse and finish
00266         writer.lastpart()
00267         msg = out.getvalue()
00268         out.close()
00269         return msg
00270 
00271 ## Get the type of any file.
00272 #
00273 # @param file - A path to any file.
00274 # @return The file type.
00275 def get_file_type(file):
00276         t = mimetypes.guess_type(file)
00277         if t and t[0]:
00278                 return t[0]
00279         return 'application/octet-stream'

00333 ## Class for \em Login process.

00337 class login:     
00338         
00339         ## Get method. Show the \em Login page
00340         #
00341         # @param errors - List of error messages.
00342         # @param messages - List of \em 'Ok' messages.  
00343         def GET(self, errors = [], messages = []):
00344                 user ={'nick':"", 'password':""}
00345                 web.render ('login.html')
00346 
00347         ## Post method. Make the \em Login process and show the main page.
00348         #
00349         def POST(self):
00350                 login = web.input()
00351                 users =  web.select(DB_TABLE_USER, where=web.sqlwhere(login))
00352                 if len(users) == 1:
00353                         # Login OK
00354                         web.setcookie('nick', login.nick)
00355                         make_user_home(login.nick)
00356                         user_path = get_all_user_path(login.nick)
00357                         image =  winsollib.Image([MASTER_CATEGORIES_XML, MASTER_APPS_XML, user_path['categories_xml_file'], user_path['apps_xml_file'], user_path['includes_xml_file']], dtd_files)
00358                         #menu_categories = image.get_all_categories_dict()
00359                         errors = []
00360                         messages = ["Ha entrado como el usuario \"" + login.nick + "\""]
00361                         web.seeother('index.html')
00362                 elif len(users) > 1:
00363                         # DB CORRUPT
00364                         print "La base de Datos est√° corrupta. Contacte con el administrador."
00365                 else:
00366                      user = login
00367                      messages = []
00368                      errors = ["Nick o password incorrecto.", "Intentelo de nuevo, registrese o obtenga su password si no la recuerda."]
00369                      web.render ('login.html')

00383 ## Class for \em Get \em password process.

00393                 user = {'nick':""}
00394                 web.render('get_password.html')
00395         
00396         ## Post method. Send a mail to the user with his password.
00397         #
00398         def POST(self):
00399                 user = web.input()
00400                 errors = []
00401                 users =  list(web.select(DB_TABLE_USER, where=web.sqlwhere(user)))
00402                 if len(users) == 1:
00403                         # Send the mail
00404                         user_info = {"nick":user.nick,
00405                                 "name":users[0].name,
00406                                 "surname":users[0].surname,
00407                                 "password":users[0].password,
00408                                 "mail":users[0].mail}
00409                         try:
00410                                 send_mail(MAIL_PASSWORD_SUBJECT, user_info, "password_text_mail.txt", "password_html_mail.txt")
00411                         except Exception:
00412                                 errors.append("No se ha podido enviar el E-mail con su informaci√≥n personal.")
00413                                 errors.append("Pongase en contacto con el administrador de WinSOL para solucionar el problema.")
00414                                 web.render('get_password.html')
00415                         else:
00416                                 web.seeother('/login.html')
00417                 elif len(users) > 1:
00418                         # DB CORRUPT
00419                         print "La base de Datos est√° corrupta. Contacte con el administrador"
00420                 else:
00421                         errors.append("Nick incorrecto. Puede que el usuario no est√© registrado")
00422                         errors.append("Intentelo de nuevo, registrese o obtenga su password si no la recuerda.")
00423                         web.render ('get_password.html')

00425 ## Class for View/Modify the User Account.

00429 class account:
00430 
00431         ## Get method. Show the \em User \em Information form.
00432         #
00433         # @param errors - List of errors messages.
00434         # @param messages - List of \em 'Ok' messages.
00435         def GET(self, errors = [], messages = []):
00436                 cookie = web.cookies()
00437                 user_path = get_all_user_path(cookie.nick)
00438                 image =  winsollib.Image([MASTER_CATEGORIES_XML, MASTER_APPS_XML, user_path['categories_xml_file'], user_path['apps_xml_file'], user_path['includes_xml_file']], dtd_files)
00439                 menu_categories = image.get_all_categories_dict()
00440 
00441                 user_info =  list(web.select(DB_TABLE_USER, where=web.sqlwhere(web.storify({'nick': cookie.nick}))))
00442                 user ={'nick': cookie.nick,
00443                        'password': user_info[0].password,
00444                        'password2': user_info[0].password,
00445                        'mail': user_info[0].mail,
00446                        'mail2': user_info[0].mail,
00447                        'name': user_info[0].name,
00448                        'surname': user_info[0].surname}
00449                 web.render ('account.html')
00450         
00451         ## Post method. Modify the User Account..
00452         #
00453         def POST(self):
00454                 user = web.input()
00455                 cookie = web.cookies()
00456                 user_path = get_all_user_path(cookie.nick)
00457                 image =  winsollib.Image([MASTER_CATEGORIES_XML, MASTER_APPS_XML, user_path['categories_xml_file'], user_path['apps_xml_file'],
00458  user_path['includes_xml_file']], dtd_files)
00459                 menu_categories = image.get_all_categories_dict()
00460                 errors = []
00461                 messages = []
00462                 
00463                 if user.password == "" or user.mail == "":
00464                         errors.append("Debe completar todos los campos marcados en negrita. Son obligatorios.")
00465                         web.render ('account.html')
00466                 # Check user_info
00467                 name = {'nick':user.nick}
00468                 if len(web.select(DB_TABLE_USER, where=web.sqlwhere(name)) ) > 0:
00469                         # OK
00470                         if user.password != user.password2:
00471                                 errors.append("Las passwords no coinciden o son nulas.")
00472                                 web.render ('account.html')
00473                         if user.mail != user.mail2:
00474                                 errors.append("Los e-mails no coinciden o son nulas")
00475                                 web.render ('account.html')
00476                         else:
00477                                 web.update(DB_TABLE_USER, where=web.sqlwhere(web.storify({'nick': cookie.nick})), password=user.password, mail=user.mail, name = user.name, surname = user.surname)
00478                                 messages = ["Se han modificado los datos con √©xito."]
00479                         web.render('account.html')
00480 
00481                 elif len(web.select(DB_TABLE_USER, where=web.sqlwhere(name)) ) == 0:
00482                         # User don't exist
00483                         # Never make this code.
00484                         errors.append("El usuario \"" + user.nick + "\" no existe.")
00485                         web.render ('acount.html')
00486                 else:
00487                        # DB CORRUPT
00488                        print "La base de Datos est√° corrompida. Compruebe que \"nick\" es PRIMARY KEY."

00492 ## Class for \em Add \em user process.
00493 #
00494 # @author David Barrag√°n Merino <bameda [AT] di.uc3m [DOT] com>
00495 # @author CRISOL-UC3M <htp://crisol.uc3m.es>
00496 class add_user:
00497 
00498         ## Get method. Show the \em Add \em User form.
00499         #
00500         # @param errors - List off error messages.
00501         def GET(self, errors = []):
00502                 user ={'nick':"", 
00503                        'password':"",
00504                        'password2':"",
00505                        'mail':"",
00506                        'mail2':"",
00507                        'name':"",
00508                        'surname':""}
00509                 web.render ('add_user.html')
00510 
00511         ## Post method. Add an user to the DDBB.
00512         #
00513         def POST(self):
00514                 user = web.input()
00515                 errors = []
00516                 if user.nick == "" or user.password == "" or user.mail == "":
00517                         errors.append("Debe completar todos los campos marcados en negrita. Son obligatorios.")
00518                         web.render ('add_user.html') 
00519                 # Check user_info
00520                 name = {'nick':user.nick}
00521                 if len(web.select(DB_TABLE_USER, where=web.sqlwhere(name)) ) == 0:
00522                         # OK
00523                         if user.password != user.password2:
00524                                 errors.append("Las passwords no coinciden o son nulas.")
00525                                 web.render ('add_user.html')
00526                         if user.mail != user.mail2:
00527                                 errors.append("Los e-mails no coinciden o son nulas")
00528                                 web.render ('add_user.html')
00529                         else:
00530                                 web.insert(DB_TABLE_USER, nick=user.nick, password=user.password, mail=user.mail, name = user.name, surname = user.surname)
00531                                 #messages = ["El usuario \""+ user.nick + "\" ha sido creado con √©xito."]
00532                                 #errors = []
00533                                 web.seeother('/login.html')
00534 
00535                 elif len(web.select(DB_TABLE_USER, where=web.sqlwhere(name)) ) == 1:
00536                         # User exist
00537                         errors.append("El usuario \"" + user.nick + "\" ya existe.")
00538                         web.render ('add_user.html')
00539                 else:
00540                         # DB CORRUPT
00541                         print "La base de Datos est√° corrompida. Compruebe que \"nick\" es PRIMARY KEY."
00542

00710 ## Class for \em Add \em Category process.
00711 #
00712 # @author David Barrag√°n Merino <bameda [AT] di.uc3m [DOT] com>
00713 # @author CRISOL-UC3M <htp://crisol.uc3m.es>
00714 class add_category:
00715 
00716         ## Get method. Show the \em Add \em Category form.
00717         #
00718         # @param errors - List of errors messages.
00719         def GET(self, errors = []):
00720                 cookie = web.cookies()
00721                 user_path = get_all_user_path(cookie.nick)
00722                 image =  winsollib.Image([MASTER_CATEGORIES_XML, MASTER_APPS_XML, user_path['categories_xml_file'], user_path['apps_xml_file'], user_path['includes_xml_file']], dtd_files)
00723                 menu_categories = image.get_all_categories_dict()
00724                 cat = {'name':"",
00725                        'label':"",
00726                        'description':""}
00727                 web.render ('add_cat.html')
00728 
00729         ## Post method. Add a new Category.
00730         #
00731         def POST(self):
00732                 cookie = web.cookies()
00733                 user_path = get_all_user_path(cookie.nick)
00734                 image =  winsollib.Image([MASTER_CATEGORIES_XML, MASTER_APPS_XML, user_path['categories_xml_file'], user_path['apps_xml_file'], user_path['includes_xml_file']], dtd_files)
00735                 category = web.input()
00736                 cat_values = [category.name, 
00737                               category.label.strip(), 
00738                               category.description]
00739                 if image.add_category(cat_values):
00740                         # Category added
00741                         image.save_categories_to_xml_file() ## To save to thee xml file
00742                         menu_categories = image.get_all_categories_dict()
00743                         category = image.get_category_dict_by_label(category.label.strip())
00744                         messages = []
00745                         messages.append("Categor√≠a \"" + category['name'] + "\" a√±adida con √©xito.")
00746                         web.render('/category.html')    
00747                 else:
00748                         # Category did'n add
00749                         menu_categories = image.get_all_categories_dict()
00750                         cat = {'name':category.name,
00751                                'label':category.label,
00752                                'description':category.description}
00753                         errors = []
00754                         errors.append("Error fatal - Compruebe que la etiqueta de esta categor√≠a no este usada y sea distinta de \"none\".")
00755                         web.render('/add_cat.html')
00756 
00757 ## Class for \em Delete \em A \em Category process.
00758 #
00759 # @author David Barrag√°n Merino <bameda [AT] di.uc3m [DOT] com>
00760 # @author CRISOL-UC3M <htp://crisol.uc3m.es>
00761 class del_category:
00762 
00763         ## Get method. Delete a Category.
00764         #
00765         # @param cat_label - The Category label.
00766         def GET(self, cat_label):
00767                 cookie = web.cookies()
00768                 user_path = get_all_user_path(cookie.nick)
00769                 image =  winsollib.Image([MASTER_CATEGORIES_XML, MASTER_APPS_XML, user_path['categories_xml_file'], user_path['apps_xml_file'], user_path['includes_xml_file']], dtd_files)
00770                 if image.del_category(cat_label):
00771                         image.save_categories_to_xml_file()
00772                         image.save_applications_to_xml_file()
00773                         image.save_includes_to_xml_file()
00774 
00775                         menu_categories = image.get_all_categories_dict()
00776                         messages = ["La categor√≠a con la etiqueta \"" + cat_label + "\" ha sido borrada."]
00777                         errors = []
00778                         web.render('/index.html')
00779                 else:
00780                         # Category didn't delete
00781                         web.redirect('/category/' + cat_label)
00782 
00783 ## Class for \em Modify \em A \em Category process.
00784 #
00785 # @author David Barrag√°n Merino <bameda [AT] di.uc3m [DOT] com>
00786 # @author CRISOL-UC3M <htp://crisol.uc3m.es>
00787 class modify_category:
00788 
00789         ## Get method. Show the \em Modify \em a \em Category form. 
00790         #
00791         # @param cat_label - The Category label.
00792         # @param errors - List of error messages.
00793         def GET(self, cat_label, errors = []):
00794                 cookie = web.cookies()
00795                 user_path = get_all_user_path(cookie.nick)
00796                 image =  winsollib.Image([MASTER_CATEGORIES_XML, MASTER_APPS_XML, user_path['categories_xml_file'], user_path['apps_xml_file'], user_path['includes_xml_file']], dtd_files)
00797                 menu_categories = image.get_all_categories_dict()
00798                 category = image.get_category_dict_by_label(cat_label)
00799                 if category != None:
00800                         web.render ('/mod_cat.html')
00801         
00802         ## Post method. Modify a Category.
00803         #
00804         # @param cat_label - The Category label.
00805         def POST(self, cat_label):
00806                 cookie = web.cookies()
00807                 user_path = get_all_user_path(cookie.nick)
00808                 image =  winsollib.Image([MASTER_CATEGORIES_XML, MASTER_APPS_XML, user_path['categories_xml_file'], user_path['apps_xml_file'], user_path['includes_xml_file']], dtd_files)
00809                 categ = web.input()
00810                 cat_values = [categ.name,
00811                               categ.description]
00812                 if image.modify_category_values(cat_label, cat_values):
00813                         image.save_categories_to_xml_file()
00814                         image.save_applications_to_xml_file()
00815                         menu_categories = image.get_all_categories_dict()
00816                         category = image.get_category_dict_by_label(cat_label)
00817                         messages = []
00818                         messages.append("Categor√≠a \"" + categ.name + "\" modificada con √©xito.")
00819                         web.render('/category.html')
00820                 else:
00821                         # Imposible
00822                         menu_categories = image.get_all_categories_dict()
00823                         cat = {'name':categ.name,
00824                                'description':categ.description}
00825                         errors = []
00826                         errors.append("Error fatal - No se ha podido modificar esta categor√≠a.")
00827                         web.render('/mod_cat.html')
00828

00964                 user_path = get_all_user_path(cookie.nick)
00965                 image =  winsollib.Image([MASTER_CATEGORIES_XML, MASTER_APPS_XML, user_path['categories_xml_file'], user_path['apps_xml_file'], user_path['includes_xml_file']], dtd_files)
00966                 menu_categories = image.get_all_categories_dict()
00967                 app ={'name':"",
00968                       'version':"",
00969                       'site':"",
00970                       'plat_win':"",
00971                       'plat_unix':"",
00972                       'plat_mac':"",
00973                       'minidescription':"",
00974                       'description':"",
00975                       'file':"",
00976                       'file_url':"",
00977                       'icon':"",
00978                       'icon_url':"",
00979                       'md5sum':"",
00980                       'categories':"",
00981                       'alternatives':""}
00982                 web.render ('add_app.html')
00983         
00984         ## Post method. Add a new App.
00985         #
00986         def POST(self):
00987                 cookie = web.cookies()
00988                 user_path = get_all_user_path(cookie.nick)
00989                 image =  winsollib.Image([MASTER_CATEGORIES_XML, MASTER_APPS_XML, user_path['categories_xml_file'], user_path['apps_xml_file'], user_path['includes_xml_file']], dtd_files)
00990                 application = web.input()
00991                 # Manuals (Not in this form)
00992                 manuals = {}
00993                 manuals['app_man_online'] = []
00994                 manuals['app_man_offline'] = []
00995                 # Plataforms
00996                 plataforms = []
00997                 try:
00998                         if application.plat_win != None:        
00999                                 plataforms.append("Windows")
01000                 except Exception, e:
01001                         pass # You don't select it
01002                 try:
01003                         if application.plat_unix != None:
01004                                 plataforms.append("GNU-Linux/UNIX")
01005                 except Exception, e:
01006                         pass # You don't select it
01007                 try:
01008                         if application.plat_mac != None:
01009                                 plataforms.append("Mac OSX")
01010                 except Exception, e:
01011                         pass # You don't select it
01012                 # Categories
01013                 categories = []
01014                 categories = application.categories.split(',')
01015                 n = 0;
01016                 for cat in categories:
01017                         categories[n] = cat.strip() #to remove leading and trailing whitespace
01018                         if categories[n] == '':
01019                                 categories.remove(categories[n])
01020                         else:
01021                                 n +=1
01022 
01023                 # Alternatives
01024                 alternatives = []
01025                 alternatives = application.alternatives.split(',')
01026                 n = 0;
01027                 for alt in alternatives:
01028                         alternatives[n] = alt.strip() #to remove leading and trailing whitespace
01029                         if alternatives[n] == '':
01030                                 alternatives.remove(alternatives[n])
01031                         else:
01032                                 n +=1
01033 
01034 
01035                 app_values = [application.name,
01036                               application.version,
01037                               application.site,
01038                               manuals,
01039                               plataforms,
01040                               application.minidescription,
01041                               application.description,
01042                               application.file,
01043                               application.file_url,
01044                               application.icon,
01045                               application.icon_url,
01046                               application.md5sum,
01047                               categories,
01048                               alternatives]
01049                 if image.add_app(app_values):
01050                         # App added 
01051                         image.save_applications_to_xml_file() ## To save to the xml file
01052                         menu_categories = image.get_all_categories_dict()
01053                         app = image.get_app_dict_by_name(application.name)
01054                         messages = []
01055                         messages.append("Aplicaci√≥n \"" + application.name + "\" a√±adida con √©xito.")
01056                         web.render('/app.html')
01057                 else:
01058                         # App did'n add
01059                         menu_categories = image.get_all_categories_dict() 
01060                         app ={'name':application.name,
01061                               'version':application.version,
01062                               'site':application.site,
01063                               'minidescription':application.minidescription,
01064                               'description':application.description,
01065                               'file':application.file,
01066                               'file_url':application.file_url,
01067                               'icon':application.icon,
01068                               'icon_url':application.icon_url,
01069                               'md5sum':application.md5sum,
01070                               'categories':application.categories,
01071                               'alternatives':application.alternatives}
01072                         app['plat_win'] = "" 
01073                         app['plat_unix'] = ""
01074                         app['plat_mac'] = ""
01075                         for plat in plataforms:
01076                                 if plat == "Windows":
01077                                         app['plat_win'] = "checked"
01078                                 elif plat == "GNU-Linux/UNIX":
01079                                         app['plat_unix'] = "checked"
01080                                 elif plat == "Mac OSX":
01081                                         app['plat_mac'] = "checked"
01082                         errors = []
01083                         errors.append("Error fatal - Compruebe que el nombre de esta aplicaci√≥n no este usada.")
01084                         web.render('/add_app.html')

01086 ## Class for \em Delete \em An \em App process.

01090 class del_application:

01093         #
01094         # @param app_name - The App name.
01095         def GET(self, app_name):
01096                 cookie = web.cookies()
01097                 user_path = get_all_user_path(cookie.nick)
01098                 image =  winsollib.Image([MASTER_CATEGORIES_XML, MASTER_APPS_XML, user_path['categories_xml_file'], user_path['apps_xml_file'], user_path['includes_xml_file']], dtd_files)
01099                 if image.del_app(app_name):
01100                         image.save_applications_to_xml_file()
01101                         image.save_includes_to_xml_file()
01102 
01103                         menu_categories = image.get_all_categories_dict()
01104                         messages = ["La aplicaic√≥n \"" + app_name + "\" ha sido borrada."]
01105                         errors = []
01106                         web.render('/index.html')
01107                 else:
01108                         # Application didn't delete
01109                         web.redirect('/app/' + app.name)

01111 ## Class for \em Modify \em An \em App process.
01112 #
01113 # @author David Barrag√°n Merino <bameda [AT] di.uc3m [DOT] com>
01114 # @author CRISOL-UC3M <htp://crisol.uc3m.es>
01115 class modify_application:
01116         
01117         ## Get method. Show the \em Modify \em an \em App form
01118         #
01119         # @param app_name - The App name.
01120         # @param errors - List of errors messages.
01121         def GET(self, app_name, errors = []):
01122                 cookie = web.cookies()
01123                 user_path = get_all_user_path(cookie.nick)
01124                 image =  winsollib.Image([MASTER_CATEGORIES_XML, MASTER_APPS_XML, user_path['categories_xml_file'], user_path['apps_xml_file'], user_path['includes_xml_file']], dtd_files)
01125                 menu_categories = image.get_all_categories_dict()
01126                 app_dict = image.get_app_dict_by_name(app_name)
01127                 app = {'name':app_dict['name'],
01128                        'version':app_dict['version'],
01129                        'site':app_dict['site'],
01130                        'minidescription':app_dict['minidescription'],
01131                        'description':app_dict['description'],
01132                        'file':app_dict['file'],
01133                        'software_url':app_dict['software_url'],
01134                        'icon':app_dict['icon'],
01135                        'icon_url':app_dict['icon_url'],
01136                        'md5sum':app_dict['md5sum']}
01137                 # Plataform
01138                 app['plat_win'] = ''
01139                 app['plat_unix'] = ''
01140                 app['plat_mac'] = ''
01141                 for plat in app_dict['plataforms']:
01142                         if plat == "Windows":
01143                                 app['plat_win'] = "checked"
01144                         elif plat == "GNU-Linux/UNIX":
01145                                 app['plat_unix'] = "checked"
01146                         elif plat == "Mac OSX":
01147                                 app['plat_mac'] = "checked"
01148                 # Categoryes
01149                 n = 0
01150                 categories = ""
01151                 for cat in app_dict['categories']:
01152                         n = n + 1 
01153                         categories = categories + cat 
01154                         if n < len(app_dict['categories']):
01155                                 categories = categories + ","
01156                 app['categories'] = categories
01157                 # Alternatives
01158                 n = 0
01159                 alternatives = ""
01160                 for alt in app_dict['alternatives']:
01161                         n = n + 1
01162                         alternatives = alternatives + alt
01163                         if n < len(app_dict['alternatives']):
01164                                 alternatives = alternatives + ","
01165                 app['alternatives'] = alternatives
01166                 web.render ('mod_app.html')
01167

01214                                 alternatives.remove(alternatives[n])
01215                         else:
01216                                 n +=1
01217                 app_values = [application.version,
01218                               application.site,

01227                               application.md5sum,
01228                               categories,
01229                               alternatives]     
01230                 if image.modify_app_values(app_name, app_values):
01231                         # App modified
01232                         image.save_applications_to_xml_file() ## To save to the xml file
01233                         menu_categories = image.get_all_categories_dict()
01234                         app = image.get_app_dict_by_name(app_name)
01235                         messages = []
01236                         messages.append("Aplicaci√≥n \"" + app_name + "\" modificada con √©xito.")
01237                         web.render('/app.html')
01238 
01239                 else:
01240                         # App did'n modify
01241                         menu_categories = image.get_all_categories_dict()
01242                         app ={'name':app_name,
01243                               'version':application.version,
01244                               'site':application.site,
01245                               'minidescription':application.minidescription,
01246                               'description':application.description,
01247                               'file':application.file,
01248                               'file_url':application.file_url,
01249                               'icon':application.icon,
01250                               'icon_url':application.icon_url,
01251                               'md5sum':application.md5sum,
01252                               'categories':application.categories,
01253                               'alternatives':application.alternatives}
01254                         app['plat_win'] = ""
01255                         app['plat_unix'] = ""
01256                         app['plat_mac'] = ""

01258                                 if plat == "Windows":
01259                                         app['plat_win'] = "checked"
01260                                 elif plat == "GNU-Linux/UNIX":
01261                                         app['plat_unix'] = "checked"
01262                                 elif plat == "Mac OSX":

01416 ## Class for \em Make \em ISO process.
01417 #
01418 # @author David Barrag√°n Merino <bameda [AT] di.uc3m [DOT] com>
01419 # @author CRISOL-UC3M <htp://crisol.uc3m.es>
01420 class make_iso:
01421 
01422         ## Get method. Show the \em Make \em ISO form.
01423         #
01424         # @param errors - List with errors messages.
01425         def GET(self, errors = []):
01426                 cookie = web.cookies()
01427                 user_path = get_all_user_path(cookie.nick)
01428                 image =  winsollib.Image([MASTER_CATEGORIES_XML, MASTER_APPS_XML, user_path['categories_xml_file'], user_path['apps_xml_file'], user_path['includes_xml_file']], dtd_files)
01429                 menu_categories = image.get_all_categories_dict()
01430                 template_list = []
01431                 for f in os.listdir(TEMPLATES_DIR):
01432                         if os.path.isdir(os.path.join(TEMPLATES_DIR, f)) and not f.startswith("."):
01433                                 if os.path.exists(MASTER_DIR+"/web/static/images/templates/"+f+".png"):
01434                                         template_list.append({'name':f,'image':f+".png"})
01435                                 else:
01436                                         template_list.append({'name':f,'image':""})
01437 
01438                 web.render('/make_iso.html')
01439         
01440         ## Post method. Create the ISO image file. 
01441         #
01442         def POST(self):
01443                 cookie = web.cookies()
01444                 user_path = get_all_user_path(cookie.nick)
01445                 image =  winsollib.Image([MASTER_CATEGORIES_XML, MASTER_APPS_XML, user_path['categories_xml_file'], user_path['apps_xml_file'], user_path['includes_xml_file']], dtd_files)
01446                 iso_options = web.input()
01447                 
01448                 # Download to system directories                
01449                 image.download_software( SOFTWARE_DIR )
01450                 image.download_icons( ICONS_DIR )
01451                 image.download_manuals( MANUALS_DIR )
01452                 image.save_applications_to_xml_file()
01453                 image.save_includes_to_xml_file()
01454                 
01455                 # Make Mrproper to users image directory
01456                 mrproper_image(cookie.nick)
01457                 
01458                 # Make html
01459                 image.gen_html(user_path['html_dir'], TEMPLATES_DIR + "/" + iso_options.template )
01460                 # Make symbolic links
01461                 for category in image.get_all_categories():
01462                         if category.is_included():
01463                                 for app in category.get_all_apps():
01464                                         if app.is_included():
01465                                                 if not os.path.exists( user_path['software_dir'] + "/" + app.get_file_name() ):
01466                                                         if os.path.exists( SOFTWARE_DIR + "/" + app.get_file_name() ):
01467                                                                 os.symlink( SOFTWARE_DIR + "/" + app.get_file_name(),user_path['software_dir'] + "/" + app.get_file_name() )
01468                                                 if not os.path.exists( user_path['icons_dir'] + "/" + app.get_icon_name() ):
01469                                                         if  os.path.exists( ICONS_DIR + "/" + app.get_icon_name() ):
01470                                                                 os.symlink( ICONS_DIR + "/" + app.get_icon_name(), user_path['icons_dir'] + "/" + app.get_icon_name() )
01471                                                 for manual in app.get_manuals()['app_man_offline']:
01472                                                         if not os.path.exists( user_path['manuals_dir'] + "/" + manual['app_man_off_file'] ):
01473                                                                 if os.path.exists( MANUALS_DIR + "/" + manual['app_man_off_file'] ):
01474                                                                         os.symlink( MANUALS_DIR + "/" + manual['app_man_off_file'], user_path['manuals_dir'] + "/" + manual['app_man_off_file'] )
01475                 if not os.path.exists( user_path['image_dir'] + "/autorun.inf" ): os.symlink( MASTER_DIR + "/cd-base/autorun.inf", user_path['image_dir'] + "/autorun.inf" )

01519 # View static files (png, jpg, gif, pdf, css,... this files are in ./static/)           
01520 
01521 ## Class to view static files (png, jpg, gif, pdf, css,... this files are in ./static/)
01522 #
01523 # @author David Barrag√°n Merino <bameda [AT] di.uc3m [DOT] com>
01524 # @author CRISOL-UC3M <htp://crisol.uc3m.es>
01525 class view_static_files:
01526 
01527         ## Get method. Load any file (phg, jpg, css,...).
01528         #
01529         # @param localpath - The path file.
01530         def GET(self, localpath):
01531                 if '..' in localpath:
01532                         return web.badrequest()
01533                 if '/' in localpath or (not localpath in os.listdir('static')):
01534                         return web.notfound()
01535                 rpath = os.path.join('static', localpath)
01536                 st = os.stat(rpath)
01537                 if (stat.S_ISREG(st.st_mode)):
01538                         web.header('Content-Type', get_file_type(localpath))
01539                         web.header('Content-Length', str(st.st_size))
01540                         web.ctx.output = open(rpath, 'rb') 
01541

01544 ## Class to css color style.
01545 #
01546 # @author David Barrag√°n Merino <bameda [AT] di.uc3m [DOT] com>

01548 class style_color:
01549 
01550         ## Get method
01551         def GET(self):
01552                 web.header("Content-Type","text/css; charset=utf-8")
01553                 print open('templates/color.css').read()
